text:
e="preserve">Watan hamara Kashmir is the official state anthem of Azad Kashmir. It was written in the mid-1960s by Abu-Al-Asar Hafeez Jullundhri.
Urdu Lyrics (Transliteration).
Watan Hamara Azad Kashmir... Azad Kashmir
Watan Hamara Azad Kashmir... Azad Kashmir
Watan Hamara Azad Kashmir... Azad Kashmir
Jan bhee qurban. Mal bhee qurban
Mal sey Piyara... Jan sey Piyara
Watan Hamara Azad Kashmir... Azad Kashmir
